## In This Section

toggle In This Section navigation

# Drivers Education

Driver Education sessions are held each year during the months of June and
July.  A general registration for all sessions is held early each fall and
continues throughout the year until no spaces remain.  Students must be at
least 14½ years of age to be eligible for this program.  Cost is $280.

Interested persons may inquire about the adult-learner program providing
individualized tutoring for driver education needs, beginner to experienced
motorcycle skills courses, and the Montana Advanced Driver Education Program.
